# Toyota Camry Hybrid 2025

The all-new Camry Hybrid combines exceptional fuel efficiency with premium comfort.

## Features

- Toyota Safety Sense 3.0 with Pre-Collision System
- 9-inch touchscreen infotainment with Apple CarPlay and Android Auto
- Wireless smartphone charging pad
- JBL Premium Audio System with 9 speakers
- Dual-zone automatic climate control
- Leather-trimmed heated front seats
- 10-way power adjustable driver seat
- Panoramic moonroof
- LED headlights with automatic high beams
- Blind spot monitoring with rear cross-traffic alert

## Unique Selling Points

- Best-in-class fuel efficiency of 25.49 km/l combined
- Only hybrid sedan in segment with 5-star NCAP safety rating
- Industry-leading 8-year / 160,000 km hybrid battery warranty
- Seamless hybrid powertrain with instant electric torque
- Premium interior with soft-touch materials throughout
- Advanced driver assistance features standard on all trims
